articles.title: Researchers Warn: Eating Too Much Salt Could Increase Your Risk of Diabetes - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A study has, for the first time, linked frequent salt consumption to Type 2 diabetes. Those at risk for Type 2 diabetes may already know to avoid sugar, but new research suggests they may want to skip the salt as well. A study recently conducted by Tulane Uni…
